CmdLine: cd $HOME &&    CUNIT_VERSION=2.1-3 &&    curl -sSOL https://github.com/Linaro/libcunit/releases/download/${CUNIT_VERSION}/CUnit-${CUNIT_VERSION}.tar.bz2 &&    tar -jxf *.bz2 &&    cd CUnit* &&    libtoolize --force --copy &&    aclocal &&    autoheader &&    automake --add-missing --include-deps --copy &&    autoconf &&       ./configure --host=powerpc-linux-gnu --build=x86_64-linux-gnu --prefix=/root/cunit-install/powerpc-linux-gnu &&    make -j $(nproc) &&    make install &&      ./configure --host=arm-linux-gnueabihf --build=x86_64-linux-gnu --prefix=/root/cunit-install/armhf &&    make -j $(nproc) &&    make install &&       ./configure --host=arm-linux-gnueabihf --build=x86_64-linux-gnu --prefix=/root/cunit-install/armhf &&    make -j $(nproc) &&    make install &&       ./configure --host=aarch64-linux-gnu --build=x86_64-linux-gnu --prefix=/root/cunit-install/aarch64 &&    make -j $(nproc) &&    make install &&    cd -
Commands.Name: run
